name: Autumn Leaves Necklace - Long Necklace
description:
I always dreamed to see and feel the autumn and it became my inspiration to create this necklace.
Autumn Leaves Necklace. 
A long necklace with a measure of the length opera 29" or 73cm. Original designed by me and became one of my favorites for everyday use with a T-shirt and jeans. One leaf with accents of fresh water white pearls and a heart shape with the words made with love. Sweet. Simply too beautiful. Closed with a lobster clasp. Long necklace 29" or 73cm and leaves long 3.5" or 8cm. This necklace will be packed in a beautiful box. 
If you want this necklace with a different length or have any other questions email me at simplepad@yahoo.com.
Please come to my blog at http://simplepaddesign.blogspot.com. Thank you.

name: Butterfly On Pearl Necklace
description:
I always liked pearls.
Mother of pearl with butterflies for a touch of sweet. This necklace looks very pretty and feminine. This necklace 17 ", but if you want a different length I can make it. No additional cost. Ends with a lobster clasp. This necklace will come with beautiful packaging. If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me at simplepad@yahoo.com. Thank you.
